    Function reference

    All functions

    clean_strings_in_df()
    clean all characters in a tibble/ data frame
    inspect_birthday()
    inspect birthday component of a string
    inspect_birthdaymonth()
    inspect birthday and -month component of a string
    inspect_birthmonth()
    inspect birthmonth component of a string
    inspect_codestructure()
    inspect code structure
    inspect_schoolnumber()
    inspect if a schoolnumber has the expected length
    load_keydata()
    load and filter data from an rds-file
    recode_in_df()
    recode a variabel in a tibble / dataframe
    report_invalid_birthday()
    report invalid birthday components of strings
    report_invalid_birthdaymonth()
    report invalid birthday and -month components of strings
    report_invalid_birthmonth()
    report invalid birthmonth components of strings
    report_invalid_codestructure()
    report invalid code structure
    report_invalid_schoolnumber()
    report invalid schoolnumbers
